tool.name: ISAslicer2
tool.description: Query and get a slice of data files from an ISA study

param.name: mtbls_id
param.label: MetaboLights Study Identifier
param.help: MTBLS ID available at MetaboLights, e.g. MTBLS1.

validator.message: ID must look like a valid MTBLS identifier

param.name: measurement_type
param.label: Measurement Type.
param.help: e.g. metabolite profiling. To select specific assays, please ensure both measurement and technology types are provided.

param.name: technology_type
param.label: Technology Type.
param.help: e.g. mass spectrometry. Leave both measurement and technology types blank if you want to query across all assays.

param.name: sample_material_type
param.label: Sample Material Type.
param.help: e.g. blood. Leave blank if you want to query across all sample types.

param.name: factor_name
param.label: Factor name to filter on.
param.help: Factor name relevant to the specified MetaboLights study. e.g. genotype.

validator.message: Factor name must not be empty

param.name: factor_value
param.label: Factor value to filter on.
param.help: Factor value relevant to the specified MetaboLights study. e.g. cyp79.

validator.message: Factor value must not be empty
